title: reksai is the definition of an OP champ
body:
that is still well designed

what i mean by this is it doesnt feel that terrible to play against her, yet she is the best jungler right now. people just dont admit it because losing to a lee sin or a nidalee or a master yi feels worse then losing to a reksai. 

she is so powercreeped right now its ridiculous

and this is coming from someone who abused reksai to diamond
